title: Balsamic Beef Asparagus Roll-ups
directions: Wash asparagus and snap off ends.
Bring a saucepan of salted water to a boil and add asparagus.
Cook 3 minutes and immediately submerge asparagus in a bowl of ice water to stop the cooking process (they should be crisp-tender)
Season steak slices with salt and pepper.
Top with cheese and 3-4 asparagus per roll
Roll-up steak and drizzle with a little balsamic vinegar
Drizzle with a little more vinegar before serving, if desired.
ingredients: 1 lb sirloin tip steak very thinly sliced
3/5 oz sharp white cheddar cheese cut into strips
